name: ★ Custom Invites // Cupcake Pk N.3
description:
Here is a sample of a custom Wedding Invitation we created for our client. Daisy's elegant design was exclusively created to match her wedding theme and colors. We added a special touch by including the couple's engagement photographs and favorite quote. This format is a custom Gate-fold, Double-sided design. To seal the look, the invitations were packed and sent in Crystal Clear envelopes filled with matching love-themed metallic confetti.
//CREATE YOUR OWN CUSTOM INVITATIONS You can create custom invitations for your special occasion too! No cookie-cutter templates here with our Cupcake Package. All designs are created exclusively for your special event. You may customize design-style, photos, colors, graphic elements & paper stock, etc. Card Specifications: * Flat or Folded card, Custom Sizes, Single or Double-Sided * Any Size * Matching Envelopes included * Paper Stock: Premium White, Ivory, Linen, Shimmer Pearl, 100% Cotton, various stocks available * Matte or Gloss finish available * Printed on Heavyweight Cardstock
//RESERVE YOUR CUSTOM DESIGN ORDER TODAY Prices: Packages are sold in sets of 25 & up + matching Envelopes * Contact us to receive a custom quote for your project * A $75.00 deposit is required to reserve your order. Place your order online today to schedule a design consultation! (Deposit goes toward your total balance)

name: ★ Classy Seniors! - Grad Invitations
description:
Send a unique and personalized invitation to announce your special graduation date! You can customize the colors in this set to any color you like and we coordinate a matching envelope.

• Sold in sets of 12 or 20
[Higher quantities available]
• Flat card, Size: A7 (5" x 7")
• Matching Poppy, Midnight, or White envelopes
• Paper: Premium White Heavy Cardstock - Matte or Gloss Finish

Personalized Graduation Invitations:
Please leave detailed information for your invitation at check-out. Once you have finished processing your order and have completed your transaction, please e-mail us your high quality photos that you would like to use, send email to cindy@kardiadesignstudio.com. We will contact you as soon as we receive your order.
